channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The 17 Best Gifts for Plant Lovers We’d Buy Ourselves (2025)
item.description: Plant parents don’t always want another plant—up your gift-giving game with these favorite plant presents we've tested.

item.title: Forget "can it run Doom?" - hardware buff shows you can run a Minecraft server on a cheap smart LED lightbulb
item.description: A hacker converted a cheap smart LED bulb into a functioning Minecraft server.

item.title: One of my favorite Dell laptops is now on sale and it's $430 cheaper than when I gave it 4.5-stars
item.description: The Dell 14 Plus is a great laptop for most people, and it's more than $400 off the price it was when I gave it 4.5 stars.

item.title: Blue Origin lands New Glenn rocket booster on second try
item.description: It's an impressive accomplishment for the new mega-rocket launch system, and paves the way for the company to start re-using the boosters in commercial missions.

item.title: Apple’s new App Review Guidelines clamp down on apps sharing personal data with ‘third-party AI’
item.description: Apple updates its App Store rules to restrict apps from sharing personal data with third-party AI without disclosure and explicit permission.

item.title: 8 Things We Liked About ‘Bat-Fam’ and 2 Things We Didn’t
item.description: The DC Studios animated show is now streaming on Prime Video and Amazon Kids+.

item.title: Tesla Reportedly Adding Apple CarPlay, Bucking Industry Trend
item.description: The move would break with Elon Musk's longstanding insistence that its native software is superior to a third-party system.

item.title: Looking for the best biggest Black Friday cloud storage discounts? These won't disappoint
item.description: This Black Friday we've rounded up all the deals that offer 90% off or more.

item.title: Forget being a ‘Meta Quest 3 killer’ I think the Steam Frame could be an ‘every XR headset killer’ for two important reasons
item.description: The Steam Frame could be the most exciting VR headset in years, unless you're Meta, Apple, and Samsung.

item.title: Valve wants Half-Life: Alyx to work well standalone on Steam Frame
item.description: When I tried Half-Life: Alyx streaming from a PC to Valve’s new Steam Frame VR headset, I was blown away; thanks to the Frame’s dedicated wireless adapter and a cool trick Valve calls “foveated streaming,” I didn’t detect any latency as I explored an industrial building and fought some head crabs. But the Frame also […]

item.title: Evacuation Warnings Issued as Atmospheric River Threatens to Drench Burn-Scarred Los Angeles
item.description: The storm could trigger dangerous flash floods and mudslides, but it may also extinguish California’s wildfire season.

item.title: Apple adjusts to the rise of the mini app with better reporting and lower commissions – and you might be the benefactor
item.description: Apple has updated how it handles mini apps with a new App Store Mini Apps Partner Program that may improve the experience and lead to cheaper in-mini-app purchases.

item.title: Neuroscience research says your next anti-aging product should be Duolingo
item.description: A new study suggests learning languages could help your brain—and body—stay younger for longer. Speaking multiple languages may protect both your brain and body by slowing down the biological aging process, increasing resilience as you get older, according to a new international study.

item.title: Deaf Tesla Employee Fired After Complaining Factory’s Heat Disabled Hearing Aids, Lawsuit Claims
item.description: The litigation claims that the company failed to adhere to federal regulations for people with disabilities.

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein Claimed Intimate Knowledge of Donald Trump’s Views in Texts With Bill Gates Adviser
item.description: In text messages from 2017, Jeffrey Epstein seemingly represented himself as positioned to pass information from the Trump White House to Bill Gates through an intermediary.

item.title: Black Friday comes early for printing fans: Elegoo's Centauri Carbon 3D printer is now just $279
item.description: The Elegoo Centauri Carbon is a budget 3D printer priced at just $279.99 this Black Friday.

item.title: Tesla Recalls Powerwall 2 Units After Fires and Property Damage
item.description: The recalled units were installed between Nov. 2020 and Dec. 2022.

item.title: Christopher Nolan Explains Why He Wanted to Make ‘The Odyssey’
item.description: The 'Dark Knight' and 'Inception' director wants his 2026 release to be an epic on a scale Hollywood has never seen.

item.title: The 45 Best Movies on Hulu, WIRED's Picks (November 2025)
item.description: Sovereign, The Rocky Horror Picture Show, and Love Actually are just a few of the movies you need to watch on Hulu right now.

item.title: Anthropic details how it measures Claude’s wokeness
item.description: Anthropic is detailing its efforts to make its Claude AI chatbot “politically even-handed” — a move that comes just months after President Donald Trump issued a ban on “woke AI.” As outlined in a new blog post, Anthropic says it wants Claude to “treat opposing political viewpoints with equal depth, engagement, and quality of analysis.” […]

item.title: I tested these officially licensed earbuds for Nintendo Switch 2 – are they really worth buying?
item.description: Looking to buy cheap earbuds for your Nintendo Switch 2? I tried this officially licensed set and they weren’t half bad.

item.title: Google permettra finalement l’installation d’applications non vérifiées sur Android, à une condition
item.description: Google voulait rendre l'installation d'applications Android de développeurs non certifiés totalement impossible, mais certains pourront quand même le faire.

item.title: Apple will take a mini commission from mini app developers
item.description: Apple is launching a new program for mini app developers that slashes its fees for in-app purchases. On Thursday, the company announced that mini app creators who join the program take advantage of a lower 15 percent commission rate — half of the up to 30 percent rate Apple charges other developers. Apple describes mini […]

item.title: The ‘Big Short’ Guy Shuts Down Hedge Fund Amid AI Bubble Fears
item.description: "Sometimes, the only winning move is not to play."

item.title: Buying a new camera phone this Black Friday? Megapixels aren’t the only important spec
item.description: If you’re looking for a new camera phone during sales season, resolution isn’t the only thing you should keep an eye out for on the spec sheet

item.title: Save $150 on the incredible Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer this Black Friday
item.description: The Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer is slightly older tech, but it's still one of the best hair dryers around – and now it's got a big price cut for Black Friday.

item.title: Hackers use Anthropic’s AI model Claude once again
item.description: Anthropic announced on Thursday that Chinese state-backed hackers used the company’s AI model Claude to automate roughly 30 attacks on corporations and governments during a September campaign, according to reporting from the Wall Street Journal. Anthropic said that up to 80% to 90% of the attack was automated with AI, a level higher than previous […]...

item.title: Who is buying VR and XR headsets anyway?
item.description: From the outside, it looks like virtual and mixed reality is having a moment. Three new headsets have launched or been announced in the last month: There's Apple's M5 Vision Pro, the Samsung Galaxy XR, and, just this week, Valve announced the Steam Frame. Given the marketing, you might assume that means Big Tech thinks […]

item.title: This Is the First Extinct Species Ever Found in Fossilized Barf—and It’s a Pterosaur
item.description: For decades, researchers believed they were looking at fish remains. They were way off the mark.

item.title: The U.S. penny is discontinued—but this national grocer is paying double if you exchange your coins. Here’s how to cash in
item.description: The 2-for-1 deal is available in 6 states, and comes as stores are anticipating a shortage after the U.S. Mint pressed its final penny this week. A grocery store is offering to buy pennies in a 2-for-1 deal. Sound like pennies from heaven? Too good to be true?

item.title: Exclusive: Trump administration has yet to implement Elon Musk’s Grok on flagship AI app
item.description: The General Services Administration cited internal testing. While a deal to make Grok available across the federal government is now in place, the agency facilitating the partnership with Elon Musk’s controversial chatbot has yet to incorporate it into its own flagship AI platform due to ongoing internal safety testing.Both lawmakers and advocacy groups have criticized the Trump administration’s interest in Grok, over concerns about Musk’s deepening relationship with the US government and the chatbot’s antisemitic and otherwise offensive rants, from back in July. After the company said it fixe...
